meaningMnemonic: A <radical>tiger</radical> has <radical>legs</radical> that belong to a <kanji>tiger</kanji>. You know, a tiger has the legs of a tiger. This is common knowledge. Nothing new here.
readingMnemonic: The <kanji>tiger</kanji> is using his legs to run away from the <reading>Torah</reading> (とら). This tiger is deathly afraid of religion, so a holy book like the Torah causes the tiger to run away.
